animal_list.name: Lion
animal_list.skill_description: Reduces the opponent's Attack by 30% for one round.

animal_list.name: Bear
animal_list.skill_description: Increases own Attack by 50% this round and ignores the opponent's Defense.

animal_list.name: Cheetah
animal_list.skill_description: An attack that cannot be avoided and ignores 40% of the opponent's Defense.

animal_list.name: Eagle
animal_list.skill_description: Guarantees you will attack first next round, regardless of Agility.

animal_list.name: Rhino
animal_list.skill_description: Deals massive damage (ATK + 5), but you also take 20% of the damage dealt.

animal_list.name: Turtle
animal_list.skill_description: Triples your Defense for one round. You cannot attack this round.

animal_list.name: Gorilla
animal_list.skill_description: Deals normal damage with a 50% chance to prevent the opponent from acting next round.

animal_list.name: Octopus
animal_list.skill_description: Reduces the opponent's Agility by 50% for two rounds.

animal_list.name: Raven
animal_list.skill_description: Reveals the opponent hybrid's current Energy and abilities.

single_image_prompt: Create a single PNG with transparent background of the animal '{{animals}}' in a comic-book superhero cartoon style. Vibrant colors, bold clean lines, dynamic pose, no text or logos, transparent background. The image should depict a single animal character suitable for an icon/portrait.
hybrid_image_prompt: Create a single PNG with transparent background of a hybrid creature that combines the distinctive features of {{animals}} into one cohesive creature. It must be a single creature, not multiple animals. The subject is the hybrid creature only, not a human or humanoid. Bold comic-book style with exaggerated heroic proportions, dramatic shading, vibrant colors, clean thick outlines, and an action pose. No text or logos.
name_prompt: Given these animal names: {{animals}}. Create a short, fun, single-name hybrid that combines them. The name must not be offensive, must not contain profanity, and must not resemble or sound like a curse word. Return only the name.
